content: अन्यतर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (declined like a pronoun) One of two (persons or things), either of the two (with <ab>gen.</ab>); तयोर्मुनिकुमारयोरन्यतरः <ls>K. 151</ls>; संतः परीक्ष्यान्यतरद्भजंते <ls>M. 1. 2</ls> the one or the other; युवयोरन्यतरागच्छतु <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 111.</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 171</ls>; other, different; अन्यतर-अन्यतर the one-the other; अन्यतरस्यां (<ab>loc.</ab> of °रा) either way, in both ways, optionally; frequently used by Pāṇini in his Sūtras in the sense of वा or विभाषा; हृक्रोरन्यतरस्यां, आत्मनेपदेष्वन्यतरस्यां &c. &c.
